summary: Main8Activity, an Android activity class, initializes two buttons and sets their onClickListeners. When clicked, the buttons display a Toast message with a random string "我未被劫持".

details.comment: This code represents an Android activity class, Main8Activity, which extends AppCompatActivity. It initializes two buttons, button and button_v0, sets their respective onClickListeners, and displays a Toast message when the buttons are clicked. The random string is used for the toast message and has a value of "我未被劫持".
Method "onCreate" initializes a button click listener and two toast message functions. Toast messages return the input string without any additional functionality.
